data.eml:eml: Two new species of Centrodora (Hymenoptera, Aphelinidae) from China, with a key to Chinese species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Ye, Li, Cheng-De (2017): Two new species of Centrodora (Hymenoptera, Aphelinidae) from China, with a key to Chinese species. ZooKeys 687: 53-61, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.687.13164, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.687.13164
